headline: LAB-LINE ORBITAL INCUBATOR/SHAKER
description: Orbital Incubator/Shaker w/Microprocessor Control    Accommodates flasks up to 6"
categories.lvl1: Laboratory Equipment > Other Scientific and Laboratory Equipment
specstable:
Manufacturer Lab-Line
Model 3529
Description Incubator-Shaker, Orbital w/Microprocessor Control
Other Information Temperature range: ambient to 60°C in 0.1° increments
Temperature control: ±0.05°C
Temperature uniformity: ±0.5°C
Speed range: 40 to 400 RPM
Shaker orbital motion: 1"
Shaker timer: 00.1 to 99.9 minutes or hours
Chamber dimensions: 22"W x 21"D x 34"L
Power Requirements 120 V 14.0 A 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
Condition Good
Exterior Dimensions
Width 35.000 in (88.9 cm)
Depth 43.000 in (109.2 cm)
Height 40.000 in (101.6 cm)
Weight 492 lb (223 kg)
